RespObjDataList.Label: Admit
Languages: Admitted.
[Responding Party/Parties] [verb] the allegations contained in Paragraph [paragraph].
[Responding Party/Parties] [verb] the allegations contained in this Paragraph.
Paragraph [paragraph] is admitted.

RespObjDataList.Label: Deny
Languages: Denied.
[Responding Party/Parties] [verb] the allegations contained in Paragraph [paragraph].
[Responding Party/Parties] [verb] the allegations contained in this Paragraph.
Paragraph [paragraph] is denied.

RespObjDataList.Label: Deny Remaining
Languages: [Responding Party/Parties] [verb] the remainder of the allegations contained in Paragraph [paragraph].
[Responding Party/Parties] [verb] the remainder of the allegations contained in this Paragraph.

RespObjDataList.Label: Lack Knowledge
Languages: [Responding Party/Parties] [verb] knowledge or information sufficient to form a belief about the truth of the allegations contained in this Paragraph.
[Responding Party/Parties] [verb] knowledge or information sufficient to form a belief about the truth of the allegations contained in Paragraph [paragraph].

RespObjDataList.Label: Legal Allegation
Languages: Paragraph [paragraph] contains legal allegations to which no answer is necessary.
This Paragraph contains legal allegations to which no answer is necessary.

RespObjDataList.Label: Quotes Document
Languages: [Responding Party/Parties] [verb] that Paragraph [paragraph] accurately quotes a document, but [verb2] any characterization of the document and [verb3] that the document speaks for itself.

RespObjDataList.Label: Incorporate Prior
Languages: [Responding Party/Parties] hereby [verb] the responses from the preceding paragraphs.

RespObjDataList.Label: Response
Languages: Subject to and without waiving the foregoing objections, [Responding Party/Parties] [verb] ...

RespObjDataList.Label: Privilege
Languages: [Responding Party/Parties] [verb] to this [Request/Interrogatory] to the extent it requests the disclosure of attorney work product or [documents/information] protected by the attorney-client privilege.

RespObjDataList.Label: Proportionality
Languages: [Responding Party/Parties] [verb] to this [Request/Interrogatory] to the extent it seeks [documents/information] that is not relevant to any party's claim or defense, nor proportional to the needs of the case.

RespObjDataList.Label: Overbroad
Languages: [Responding Party/Parties] [verb] to this [Request/Interrogatory] as overbroad and burdensome.

RespObjDataList.Label: Rule 33(d)
Languages: As permitted by Rule 33(d) of the Federal Rules of Civil Procedure, [Responding Party/Parties] [verb] [Propounding Party/Parties] to the following documents:

RespObjDataList.Label: Cumulative
Languages: [Responding Party/Parties] [verb] to this [Request/Interrogatory] as cumulative of prior discovery requests.

RespObjDataList.Label: Repetitive
Languages: [Responding Party/Parties] [verb] to this [Request/Interrogatory] as repetitive of prior discovery requests and directs [Propounding Party/Parties] to ....

RespObjDataList.Label: Premature Expert
Languages: [Responding Party/Parties] [verb] to this [Request/Interrogatory] as premature to the extent it requires disclosure of expert testimony. Discovery is ongoing and [Responding Party/Parties] will supplement this Response at the appropriate time.

RespObjDataList.Label: Premature Contention
Languages: [Responding Party/Parties] [verb] to this [Request/Interrogatory] as premature to the extent it requires disclosure of contentions. Discovery is ongoing and [Responding Party/Parties] will supplement this Response at the appropriate time.

RespObjDataList.Label: Equally Available
Languages: [Responding Party/Parties] [verb] to this [Request/Interrogatory] as requesting [documents/information] equally available to [Propounding Party/Parties].

RespObjDataList.Label: Publicly Available
Languages: [Responding Party/Parties] [verb] to this [Request/Interrogatory] as requesting [documents/information] that are publicly available.

RespObjDataList.Label: Response
Languages: Subject to and without waiving the foregoing objections, [Responding Party/Parties] [verb] ...
